Future Development¶

The following features are logical next steps:

  • Enforce form validation: currently input pattern attributes are ignored, since there is nothing to “submit”. However, this also means that nonsensical inputs (e.g., entering a non-numeric value for a numeric input) are unhandeled.

  • The “LAMMPS arguments” option could benefit from its own custom widget. Currently, there is only a tooltip that directs the user to the LAMMPS manual.

  • Benchmark examples: For each page, an example of “input settings -> output shell script” w/ optional example project download so user can see how the script is supposed to work.

  • Other simulation programs: OpenMM, VASP

  • Content management system (CMS) features: form editor, form builder.
